package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);

                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));

            fos.flush();

            e.printStackTrace();

        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));

            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

        }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;

public class DigitalSignature {

    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());

            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());

            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);

                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));

            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }

        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);

                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){

            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {

            String plaintext="testy.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){

            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));

            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();

            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}
package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){

            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";

            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }
}

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;
import java.security.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){
        try {
            String plaintext="testy.txt";
            String encrypted="testye.txt";
            Cipher cipher=Cipher.getInstance("RSA");
            KeyPairGenerator kpg=KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("RSA");
            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
            kpg.initialize(2048,new SecureRandom());
            KeyPair kp=kpg.genKeyPair();
            cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE,kp.getPrivate());
            byte[] plain=new byte[245];
            FileInputStream fis=new FileInputStream(plaintext);
            FileOutputStream fos=new FileOutputStream(encrypted);
            while(fis.read(plain)!=-1){
                fos.write(cipher.doFinal(plain));
            }
            fos.flush();
            fis.close();
        } catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException | NoSuchPaddingException | InvalidKeyException | IOException | BadPaddingException | IllegalBlockSizeException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        DigitalSignature n= new DigitalSignature();


    }

package org.cosmo.remotetransport.security;

import javax.crypto.BadPaddingException;
import javax.crypto.Cipher;
import javax.crypto.IllegalBlockSizeException;
import javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException;
import java.io.*;

public class DigitalSignature {
    private byte[] publicKey;
    public DigitalSignature(){

            SecureRandom sr=new SecureRandom();
